TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PeerEndPoint extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerEndPoint Implements IDisposable, IEquatable(Of PeerEndPoint), ISerializable

summary.span: 代表 的位置，或是 執行個體，此執行個體是透過描述對等共同作業基礎結構中 或 的目前執行個體，以指定唯一的網路位址組態。

span.span: Represents the location of a , or instance specified with a unique network address configuration by describing the current instance of a or within the Peer-to-Peer Collaboration Infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對等的 「 端點 」 描述連絡人的顯示位置 — 描述目前可用的執行個體中對等共同作業網路連絡人的唯一網路位址設定。A peer "endpoint" describes a contact's presence location — the unique network address configuration that describes the currently available instance of the contact within the peer collaboration network. 單一連絡人可以是可從對等共同作業網路內的多個端點。A single contact can be available at multiple endpoints within the peer collaboration network. 監看連絡人的對等可以查詢的任何特定對等的目前狀態、 應用程式或物件更新該連絡人與相關聯的端點。A peer watching a contact can query any of the endpoints associated with that contact for specific peer presence, application, or object updates.

summary.span: 產生 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Generates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會提供開發人員已經知道的 IP 位址萬一他們想要連絡。This constructor is provided in the event a developer already knows the IP address of the they wish to contact. 使用這個建構函式來產生明確執行個體，有利於建立的接著可用來對等體 IP 位址所識別使用對等共同作業基礎結構進行互動的類別執行個體。Utilizing this constructor to generate an explicit instance facilitates the creation of a class instance that can in turn be used to interact with the peer identified by an IP address, using the Peer Collaboration Infrastructure.

summary.span: 當屬性值設定後，因非同步作業而未引發的所有事件都會有建立該特定 之執行緒上回呼的相關事件處理常式。

span.span: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific .

value.span: 實作 介面的物件，且由這個型別的執行個體在建立事件處理常式的執行緒上，用來同步處理事件處理常式。

span.span: Object that implements the interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設設定值，這個屬性是`null`，表示所有事件處理常式會在系統執行緒集區執行緒上都呼叫。The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread. 此屬性通常這類設定的 UI 項目執行個體。This property is typically set to a UI element such as a instance.
